title: AI company Eightfold sued for helping companies secretly score job seekers
description: Jan 21 : Eightfold AI, a venture capital-backed artificial intelligence hiring platform used by Microsoft, PayPal and many other Fortune 500 companies, is being sued in California for allegedly compiling reports used to screen job applicants without their knowledge.The lawsuit filed on Tuesday accusing Eightf

title: Anthropic CEO Says AI Could Replace Software Engineers in 6 to 12 Months
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei believes software engineers may soon be an extinct species. In an interview with The Economist at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Amodei said AI models could do “most, maybe all” of what software engineers currently do within six to twelve months. “I have engineers...

title: Rollout of AI may need to be slowed to ‘save society’, says boss of JP Morgan
description: Jamie Dimon warns of civil unrest as Nvidia’s Jensen Huang argues that tech will create rather than destroy jobsJamie Dimon, the boss of JP Morgan, has said artificial intelligence “may go too fast for society” and cause “civil unrest” unless governments and business support displaced workers.While advances in AI will have huge benefits from increasing productivity to curing diseases, the technology may need to be phased in to “save society”. Continue reading...

title: Nano-Cap Brand Engagement Network Stock Rallies As Africa AI Deal Fuels Investor Buzz
description: Brand Engagement Network Inc. (NASDAQ:BNAI) shares are up on Wednesday with a session volume of 44.40 million compared to the average volume of 6.26 million.The stock’s rise comes as the company has secured a $2.050 million AI licensing partnership in Africa, which may enhance its market position...

title: Analysis: Amazon One Medical’s Health AI Assistant—Agentic Care or Algorithmic Gatekeeping?
description: What You Should Know – Amazon One Medical has launched Health AI, an agentic assistant integrated into the One Medical app that provides 24/7 personalized health guidance grounded in a member’s unique medical history. – The tool goes beyond generic search by explaining lab results, managing medications, and booking appointments, while utilizing clinical guardrails to ...
